content: **crochet santa helper hat free pattern by crochet for you** the santa helper hat is made by combining two patterns bobble & stripes santa hat and crown ear warmer which were previously released on crochet for you blog the pattern available in different sizes toddler = 17-18″ circumference / 20″ height child/teen =19-20″ circumference / 23″ height adult = 21-22″ circumference / 26″ height
